item.description:
We're going to try a new location for this one to see what it's like, with the potential that we'll use it more often.

http://www.checkeredf...

It's indoor karting with electric karts.

Couple of reasons for trying this one:

1) It's North of Boston so might attract a more people in that area
2) It's a LOT cheaper than F1 Boston

It's $10 per race and $5 for the required license! That compares to $28 for one race and $10 for the license at F1 Boston.

They close at 6:00PM on Sundays, so I'm scheduling it for Saturday this time.

Directions available here:

http://www.checkeredf...

I'll meet you around the front desk. I'll wear a British Grand Prix F1 shirt to make me stick out a little.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Will be around the desk area in a British GP F1 shirt
item.name: NEW LOCATION: Checkered Flag Indoor Karting - Haverhill, MA
